Detailed Description

SOX module responsible for current derating calculation.

calculates the SoF from temperature data (i.e., minimum and maximum temperature of cells)

Parameters
[in]minimumCellTemperature_ddegCminimum temperature of cells
[in]maximumCellTemperature_ddegCmaximum temperature of cells
[out]pAllowedTemperatureBasedCurrentpointer where to store the results
[in]pConfigLimitValuespointer to the structure used for SOF calculation
[in]pCalculatedSofCurvespointer to the structure containing limit values

◆ SOF_Init()

void SOF_Init ( void  )

initializes the area for SOF (where derating starts and is fully active).

Pseudocode for linear function parameter extraction with 2 points:

  • slope = (y2 - y1) / (x2-x1)
  • offset = y1 - (slope) * x1
  • function y= slope * x + offset

Definition at line 350 of file sof_trapezoid.c.
